Key: (It's morning.)
Oogh...

(Feeling the burn of light on my eyelids,
I tossed in my sleep.)

(Being awake, but wanting to stay nestled in
your sheets... makes for a frustrating morning.)
(Hm? What's this?)

(This soft sensation. So warm and cuddly.
What could it be?)

(I'm sure it's just my pillow or blanket.
I can't let go once I've cuddled it. Well, not
true, but I held on tighter regardless.)
Mmm...

(I wonder where this warmth is coming from.
I'll never get out of bed at this rate.)
Mm...
Hmm?
(...Wha?! What's going on?!)

(I snapped wide awake in shock. Was Maria
sleeping next to me?!)

(I was half-asleep and ended up hugging her...
Why is Maria in my bed...?)
Mm...
Oh...
Good morning, Shido.

Good morning... Maria. Why are you here?
Didn't you sleep in your own bed last night?
Yes, I did.
Then why are you here?!

People who date, boyfriends and girlfriends,
are often depicted in bed together in my data.
It felt like a logical conclusion, Shido.

How'd you come to that conclusion? Even if
we were dating, we're still just students!

No, that is incorrect. You have previous
experiences similar to this.

Well, that is true. Kotori... No, that's safe.
Kaguya and Yuzuru crawled in, but they're
siblings—hm?
Is something wrong, Shido?

Ah. Er, no. It's nothing. So, is that why you
crawled into my bed?

Yes. That is why I excused myself to be
next to you.
Your calmness is disconcerting...
It was an extremely enchanting night.
Would you mind not saying stuff like that?!
It is a joke.
Joke or not, it's out of line!

(Where in the world did she get that sense
of humor... Jeez, whose influence was that?!)

Please refrain from surprising me like this
in the future. It's no good for my heart.

I understand. If that is what you wish Shido,
it is disappointing, but I will let it go.
It's disappointing, huh...

Of course. This act is necessary in order to
build trust... in addition to teaching me about
love.

Yeah, but it's kind of an ethical concern.
You shouldn't enter people's beds without
asking.

I was not aware that any laws were being broken.
There is no issue. Even if it was illegal, there
is no judge in this world. I wouldn't allow it.

Why are you being obtuse? It's true that
nothing illegal happened, but it's still wrong.
If someone had seen us...
Like how I saw? Quite thoroughly, I might add.
Gah, Kotori?!

It's a little rude to greet your cute sister
like that, don't you think?
S-Sorry...

Well, I don't get the circumstances, but
you're fine, Shido. If you were always this
innocent, you'd be doing me a favor.
Hey, you look kind of upset. Kotori...?

It's nothing at all. Come on. If you're awake,
then let's eat breakfast.

Heads up, Kotori. It's not like I was doing
anything weird...

No excuse needed. It doesn't matter as long as
you're making progress with her. But if today's
breakfast isn't up to par, your secret will slip.
Hey! Kotori-san?!
Shido. We should proceed.
Another day, another headache.
Um, Kotori?
What?

Are you... upset? Was Hamburg steak good
enough for breakfast?

(I did the best I could with what I had, but
I can't prepare certain dishes without the
right ingredients.)
*sigh*...
Wh-What?

I'm not upset about anything. Just thinking
about stuff.

Why do you ask? Is there something I should
be upset about? Did you have some kind of...
ulterior motive, or something?

N-No! That's not it! This morning, Maria climbed
into my bed, but it's not like we did anything!

You don't have to yell it. I already know how
spineless you are, Shido.
That's pretty harsh.

Just speaking the truth. Either way, if Arusu's
taken a liking to you, then you might be able
to attract her.
Attracting Maria... Hm.

If her goal is to figure out the meaning of
love, then it'd be easiest for her to experience
it herself.
I guess.
What's wrong? Something on your mind?

Well, I can't really explain it, but there's
something different about Maria.

Different? She's a lot wiser than she used
to be, but that's only because she's been
observing us for a while now, right?

I mean, that makes sense, but I don't think
that's why.

(She knows, but she doesn't. When I look at
Maria, that's the sense I get from her.)

Huh. Well, it might be a hint. Keep that in mind
the next time you get that feeling.
Right.
Shido. I finished cleaning up.

Thanks. Sorry for always leaving it for you to
do.

Is that an issue? This is the least I can do
considering I am living off of your courtesy.
But you don't have to do it all alone, you know?

But I was taught that this was the best way
to attract a partner. She who controls the
kitchen... controls Shido.

Who in the world told you something
as crazy as that?

(If I think about it, there's only one person
crazy enough...)
It was Origami Tobiichi.
Figures...

That does sound like something that'd come
out of its mouth.
(Oh sister, don't call her "it"...)

Now then Shido, please prepare yourself to
leave for school.
School? Isn't it kinda early?

If we leave the house at the usual time,
we will be heading to school with a large
crowd as we had yesterday.

So, in other words, you want to leave for
school as just the two of us?

I believe it is a good opportunity to experience
actions a couple would perform. It is early, but
if we use detours, we will arrive on time.
So, what should I do here?

Of course, the answer is obvious.
Go ahead.

Wha, that was a quick response! I was
hoping you'd persuade her not to!

If you went with the other Spirits, they'd
just get in the way. I think it's worth trying
to head to class with just you two.
I guess. You have a point.

I'll sidestep everyone else somehow.
See you later, Onii-chan.

Urgh. If this is really happening, I should get
ready to go.
Yes. I will be waiting at the front door.

(I heard a hint of cheer in Maria's voice
as I stifled a yawn.)

(If Maria's happy, then this might be for the
best.)
